ModMetaData.name: No Burn Metal
ModMetaData.author: Unon
ModMetaData.description:
NO LONGER FLAMMABLE - Steel - Plasteel - Gold - Silver
STILL NOT FLAMMABLE - Uranium - Jade
Utilizes xpath patching to be a cleaner method. Doesn't dirty the GUI with ShowModDesignators loaded. All my version does is make sure in the case of catastrophic failure (Jade, or Uranium becoming flammable), that these values will persist.
Similar Mods - Non-Flammable Metals by Magical Liopleurodon - Metal Doesn't Burn by Crisniper
